name: The Arcane King
description:
Created for Gosu Game Jam 2! This game is open-source on GitHub.

"Your Majesty! Our kingdom is under attack!"

In this medieval tower-defence game, build archer towers, catapults, ballistas and more to hold off a never-ending horde of varied enemies.

If the onslaught becomes too much for your buildings to handle, take matters into your own hands and cast powerful spells during the heat of battle!

How long can your castle survive - are you truly worthy of the throne?

Controls

Left-click: Select/place building, buy/cast spell

Right-click: Cancel building/spell

Space: Hold to speed up gameplay

F: Toggle between medieval font and plain Arial font
